metadata.title: Oscar Oceguera - Fullstack JavaScript Engineer
metadata.description: Professional portfolio of Oscar Eduardo Oceguera Bibriesca, a fullstack JavaScript engineer specializing in React, Node.js, and modern web technologies.

hero.name: Oscar Eduardo Oceguera Bibriesca
hero.title: Fullstack JavaScript Engineer
hero.subtitle: Building innovative web solutions with React, Node.js, and modern JavaScript. Passionate about sharing knowledge and tackling challenging problems.

about.title: About Me
about.paragraph1: I'm a software developer who enjoys challenges and loves building innovative solutions. As a team builder, I believe in the power of collaboration and knowledge sharing.
about.paragraph2: Currently working at Clip, I bring perseverance, capability, and innovation to every project I work on.
about.communityValue: Organizer at Eventloop • Volunteer at JSConfMX
